segments.text: Will you bring our bill , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , certainly . I'll be back in a minute . Here you are
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks.Let me see . I think there's a mistake on the bill here.Would you mind checking , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , not.Let me check.Oh , you seem bo be correct .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about tax and service charge ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Only ten percent tax is included in the bill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then one hundred U . S . dollars covers everything , doesn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1
